pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, June 22, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation. A media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Restricted coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 10:45 a.m. and to make their way to the P1 Gate once on the grounds.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7518
    Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
    Pass code: 6822783#

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual conversation with members of the Parliamentary Internship Programme.

Closed to media.

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual conversation with members of the House of Commons Page Program.

Closed to media.
